definition: dew/syrup/nectar/outdoors (not under cover)/to show/to reveal/to betray/to expose

sentences.english: Australian beef tenderloin, truffle mashed potato, roasted vegetables, red wine sauce.
sentences.chinese: 澳洲牛裏脊，松露土豆泥，烤時蔬，紅酒汁。

sentences.english: Even white truffles , the prized culinary delicacy, could not escape the slump.
sentences.chinese: 即便是食中珍饈松露也難逃貶值的命運。

sentences.english: Truffle "hunters" try to avoid the taxman as much as drug dealers.
sentences.chinese: 松露“獵手”躲避收稅員就像毒販一樣。

sentences.english: Pick up a few chocolate truffles to share the next time you get together.
sentences.chinese: 下次約會的時候帶一些巧克力松露。

sentences.english: The foie gras and truffle treatment worked very well.
sentences.chinese: 看來鵝肝醬和松露的治療效果非常好。

sentences.english: France, the traditional method is to use the ground floor of pigs to truffles unearthed.
sentences.chinese: 法國傳統的方法是利用豬來掘出地下的松露。

sentences.english: Gratinated Pacific scallop carpaccio, Parisian mushroom, truffle butter sauce.
sentences.chinese: 醃太平洋扇貝，巴黎式蘑菇，松露黃油汁。

sentences.english: 'Mary and Truffle won't be going back to Longa.
sentences.chinese: 瑪麗和松露不會再回到龍格島了。

sentences.english: After the truffles delivered on the 16th, they will hold a "white truffle feast."
sentences.chinese: 松露16日送抵後，她們將舉辦一場“白松露盛宴”。

sentences.english: Working away with the prospect of truffle fries tonight.
sentences.chinese: 今晚爲松露薯條的前景而奮戰。

sentences.english: I do love some halibut sashimi with truffle, I like me some blue crab hand roll.
sentences.chinese: 我喜歡大比目魚刺身配上松露，我也喜歡藍蟹手卷。

definition: matsutake (Tricholoma matsutake), edible mushroom considered a great delicacy in Japan
rice in gravy, typically with meat and vegetables
macrolepiota, mushroom native to Yunnan Province
